ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Dual Wield Cap {eqbard}
ygData.msgSnippet: Got an email from a 41 bard saying his DW hit 210 after the last patch.  So I have no clue what the formula or cap is now. Rokenn ... From: Matt DeBarger
ygData.messageBody:
Got an email from a 41 bard saying his DW hit 210 after the last patch. So
I have no clue what the formula or cap is now.

Rokenn

-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Monday, March 05, 2001 6:41 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Dual Wield Cap {eqbard}


Weird thing this wekeend. At 51 my dual wield was 203, never moved after
hopping up to that in the first bub.
I am less than halfway through 52 (2 unrezzed deaths though, ouch) and my
dual wield is at 216 now??? How is our cap caluculated?

Elfson Allegro 52 Veeshan
